mapper.insert: insert into journal(journal_date, journal_modify, journal_title) values(#{journalDate}, #{journalModify}, #{journalTitle})

INSERT INTO journal_file (file_original_name, file_saved_name, file_type, file_size, file_path, file_reg_date, journal_no) VALUES (#{fileOriginalName}, #{fileSavedName}, #{fileType}, #{fileSize}, #{filePath}, #{fileRegDate}, #{journalNo})
